猫

从前，我养了一只猫，我有十块钱，会用八块钱给它买吃的，经常给它洗澡，它也很粘我。

后来，我带它出去玩，路人觉得它很可爱，他们给它喂猫粮，火腿肠，我很不开心，因为它是我的。我想把它抱回家，可是它挣脱我，冲着给它好吃的人喵喵，我抱了几次他都不跟我走，还挠伤了我，于是我转身就走了.....

后来，偶然在路上遇到了它，它身上脏兮兮的。路人们只会给它好吃的，陪它玩玩，却不会带它回家，给它洗澡。它看到我后就跟着我回家，我把它关在了门外，它在门外喵喵地叫着，叫的我很难受，
可是我不会再要它了
。

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

去年元夜时，花市灯如昼。
月上柳梢头，人约黄昏后。
今年元夜时，月与灯依旧。
不见去年人，泪湿春衫袖。

我与旧事归于尽,来年依旧迎花开。
今生君恩已还尽,来世不必再相逢。

不知道有多少人和我一样体验过一遍ow2起新号的心酸，角色不花钱就只能慢慢解锁，慢到什么地步呢，慢到打一般只能用奶用t，因为根本没有枪位角色，毛妹奥丽莎玩到死，好不容易解锁个抢位又都是弱势角色，吃不到2的抢位加成，怎么说呢，落差感太强，我好歹也买断过四个典藏的玩家到现在连角色都用不了，皮肤就更不用想了，再说游戏性，ow是一个专注于赛事的游戏，版本的改动永远跟着owl中角色程度在改游戏，暴雪从来不在意普通玩家的感受，不过无所谓了，傻逼暴雪一直如此，祝暴雪工作人员早死早超生，

"Overwatch1 is a great game."
"The closure of Overwatch feels like a money-grabbing move. It used to be a buy-to-play game, then transitioned to free-to-play with in-game purchases, leaving previous paying players without meaningful compensation. This betrayal affects all players, especially the Chinese community. There's no need to go into the details, but words fall short of describing Activision Blizzard's actions."
"I'd like to tell the bosses at Activision Blizzard to be more cautious on their journey westward."
"Furthermore, I hope that Microsoft, after successfully acquiring it, considers the fate of Overwatch1."

Been playing OW since it launched as OW1.

It's been a badly balanced, unfun game for years and it has only gotten worse and worse overtime, OW2 has been the killing blow for the game; the promise of PVE was the only thing that kept me even remotely interested in a game that I could not find to have any fun in, but with the cancellation of the promised mode, there is nothing that would make me ever want to come back. It's a frustrating mess which you should avoid, it's one of the most unfun game I've ever had the misfortune of playing. 

Avoid at any cost, there are much better FPS games out there, ones that respect your time much more, your money, are better balanced and are actually fun.

I picked up Overwatch in 2016 when it first came out. Like many others, I was hooked on the fun, colourful and unique game that the original game was when it initially released. Like many others, I stopped playing around the time of the great content drought and, like many others, I was excited for the promised PVE missions Blizzard were planning to bring to an updated Overwatch 2.

To sum up my overall impression of Overwatch 2, I quote the great TheReportOfTheWeek: "My disappointment is immeasurable, and my day is ruined." 

This game, is by far, on of, if not the biggest sellout clusterfucks of a fail I have ever seen a AAA title produce. Furthermore, Blizzard Entertainment has taken a great IP, covered it in shit, microwaved said shit, and put a predatory micro-transactions model in place of loot boxes. Push maps and 5v5 are a drag compared to 6v6. Micro-transactions and corporate greed have killed this game. The competitive matchmaking system is still busted. In games you either absolutely steamroll or get steamrolled - there is nothing inbetween.

Bobby Kotick is a cancer on this game and Blizzard, a once prestigious company. I really hope the lore masters and art team of this game keep doing the fantastic work they do alongside the cinematic animators. At the moment, the efforts of theses departments is what keeps this game alive.
Small Indie developers

And the worst thing is. some people will pay a ton of money, because they don't mind the cold.
